entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as the one who was almost sure Dumbledore's eyes flickered towards him.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is mentioned as the headmaster of Hogwarts and is being bowed out by Malfoy.

entities.name: malfoy
entities.description: Malfoy is mentioned as saying admirable sentiments to Dumbledore.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as being hidden with Harry in the corner.

entities.name: fudge
entities.description: Fudge is mentioned as waiting for Hagrid to go ahead of him.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is mentioned as saying something about following the spiders.

entities.name: hogwarts
entities.description: Hogwarts is mentioned as the school where Dumbledore and Hagrid are present.

entities.name: spiders
entities.description: Spiders are mentioned as something that can lead people to find out some stuff.

relationships.description: Harry was almost sure Dumbledore's eyes flickered towards him.
Malfoy said admirable sentiments to Dumbledore.
Hagrid stood his ground in front of Fudge.
Hagrid said that following the spiders would lead people to find out some stuff.
